experience.title: AI Workflow Automation Developer
bullets: Built low-code automation tools to streamline warehouse and delivery workflows, reducing manual data entry and improving overall logistics efficiency.
Used Python and YAML to develop AI-powered systems that automatically processed shipping data, flagged delivery issues, and routed items based on location and urgency.
Integrated with tools like Airtable and Zapier to visualize workflows and make operations easier for non-technical staff to manage and modify.
Worked closely with logistics managers to identify pain points and deploy AI workflows that automated routine tasks such as inventory updates and shipment tracking.

experience.title: Research Assistant
experience.company: University of Central Florida, Prof. Boloni’s Lab
bullets: Built automated workflows to streamline data collection and analysis for research on AI-driven content detection.
Created low-code tools to help researchers visualize model outputs and manage datasets without needing advanced programming skills.
Designed decision-making flows that integrated machine learning predictions into study pipelines, improving research efficiency and reproducibility.
Documented all processes to support collaboration and enable future researchers to reuse and build on existing workflows.

projects.name: AI Resume Optimization Platform
projects.description: Built a SaaS platform that analyzes job postings and optimizes resumes using OpenAI API, automatically matching candidate skills with job requirements and suggesting targeted improvements.
bullets: Developed PDF parsing and text extraction capabilities to process uploaded resumes, creating structured data for AI-driven analysis and keyword optimization.
Implemented job posting scraper and NLP pipeline to extract key requirements, qualifications, and preferences from company career pages and job boards.
Created responsive web interface with real-time feedback system, enabling users to iteratively refine their resumes based on ATS compatibility scores and industry-specific recommendations.

projects.name: AI Video Generation Platform for Social Media
projects.description: Developed a SaaS application that transforms PDFs and text prompts into engaging TikTok/Instagram videos using AI-generated voiceovers and animated character dialogues.
bullets: Integrated OpenAI API for content summarization and script generation, automatically converting study materials into digestible video segments optimized for social media consumption.
Built custom video rendering pipeline using FFmpeg and Python to synchronize AI-generated audio with character animations, supporting multiple content formats and aspect ratios.
Implemented user dashboard for content management and video customization, allowing creators to generate educational content featuring popular animated characters discussing user-specified topics.

projects.name: Custom AI Chatbot Builder for Small Businesses
projects.description: Created a SaaS platform enabling small businesses to deploy custom AI chatbots trained on their website content, product information, and business-specific knowledge bases.
bullets: Developed web scraping and content ingestion system to automatically extract and structure business information, creating vector embeddings for contextual customer support responses.
Integrated OpenAI API with retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) to ensure chatbot responses are accurate, relevant, and aligned with business policies and offerings.
Built embeddable widget system with customizable UI components, allowing seamless integration into existing websites with minimal technical setup required.

education.degree: Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science and Minor in Computational Mathematics and Health Sciences
education.honors: Received Florida Academic Scholars Bright Futures Scholarship offered to students for 4.0 GPA

optimized.summary: Detail-oriented and innovative Software Engineer with a strong foundation in software development and automation solutions. Experienced in leveraging low-code platforms and programming languages to enhance operational efficiency within collaborative environments. Adept at building and maintaining high-performance applications and automating processes to solve complex problems in logistics and research through excellent teamwork and strategic initiative.

experience.title: Software Engineer - AI Workflow Developer
bullets: Developed low-code automation tools to enhance warehouse and delivery workflows, improving efficiency and reducing potential bottlenecks.
Utilized Python and YAML to build AI-driven systems for automated shipping data processing, optimizing routing decisions based on urgency and location.
Collaborated with logistics teams to deploy AI solutions that minimized manual data entry tasks, aligning technology with operational needs.

experience.title: Software Engineer - Research Assistant
experience.company: University of Central Florida, Prof. Boloni’s Lab
bullets: Engineered automated workflows for data collection and analysis in research projects focused on AI-driven content detection, enhancing study accuracy and efficiency.
Designed user-friendly low-code visualizations for model outputs, empowering researchers to manage datasets effectively without needing advanced programming skills.
Integrated machine learning predictions into study pipelines, leading to improved research reproducibility and a better understanding of the data.

projects.name: AI Resume Optimization Platform
projects.description: Created a SaaS platform that optimizes resumes by leveraging OpenAI API to align candidate skills with job requirements, providing actionable suggestions.
bullets: Implemented advanced PDF parsing to extract structured data from resumes, facilitating comprehensive keyword optimization and analysis.
Developed a job posting scraper that utilized NLP techniques to derive essential qualifications and preferences from various job boards.
Built an intuitive web interface that offers real-time feedback, enabling users to refine their resumes for effective Applicant Tracking System (ATS) compatibility.

projects.name: AI Video Generation Platform for Social Media
projects.description: Developed a SaaS application converting academic texts and prompts into dynamic social media videos with AI-generated voices and animations.
bullets: Leveraged OpenAI API for content summarization, transforming lengthy study material into concise, engaging video segments suitable for TikTok and Instagram.
Engineered a custom rendering pipeline using FFmpeg and Python to ensure high-quality audio-visual synchronization across diverse formats.
Created a creator dashboard that simplifies content management and customization, enhancing user experience and streamlining the video creation process.

projects.name: Custom AI Chatbot Builder for Small Businesses
projects.description: Developed a platform that helps small businesses create customized AI chatbots by utilizing proprietary content for accurate customer support.
bullets: Crafted a web scraping system for content extraction, allowing businesses to seamlessly feed data into the chatbot engine for natural interactions.
Integrated the OpenAI API utilizing retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) to ensure contextual relevance in customer service responses.
Designed embeddable UI components to facilitate easy integration of chatbots into existing websites, ensuring minimal technical setup.

education.degree: Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science and Minor in Computational Mathematics and Health Sciences
education.honors: Received Florida Academic Scholars Bright Futures Scholarship due to exemplary academic performance.

job_description: Company OverviewMore than 35 years ago, SelectQuote was founded on one core promise: to help our customers protect the people they value most. We pioneered the way consumers shopped for term life insurance, and now, we also help people find home insurance, auto insurance, senior health insurance and more. Our quick and easy process saves consumers both time and money, and today, more than 2 million families trust us to help them with their insurance needs.But what truly sets us apart is our people, and the opportunities to grow your career with SelectQuote are unmatched.About The RoleAs a Software Engineer I you will be responsible for developing and maintaining software products under the guidance of senior engineers. You will collaborate within a cross-functional team fostering mutual learning and growth while building supporting and deploying software with high availability performance efficiency and security ensuring disaster recovery capabilities. Additionally you may participate
